sentence.Network_en: He began informally to handle Ted's tax affairs for him.
sentence.Network_cn: 他开始非正式地为特德打理税务。

sentence.Network_en: Everyone dressed informally in shorts or jeans.
sentence.Network_cn: 大家都穿得很休闲，不是穿了短裤就是穿了牛仔裤。

sentence.Network_en: You will have a chance to circulate and chat informally.
sentence.Network_cn: 你们会有机会四处走动一下,互相聊聊.

entry.tran: (言辞或行为)非正式的，亲切随便的
entry.def: Informal speech or behaviour is relaxed and friendly rather than serious, very correct, or official.

example.tran: 她不拘礼节,让人耳目一新。

example.ex: His friend was less good-looking, but a lot more informal and relaxed.
example.tran: 他的朋友没那么英俊,却随意、放松得多。

entry.def: An informal situation is one which is relaxed and friendly and not very serious or official.

example.ex: I would like it to be an informal occasion...
example.tran: 我希望把它办得不那么正式。

example.ex: The house has an informal atmosphere.
example.tran: 房间里有一种轻松随意的氛围。

entry.tran: (衣服)非正式场合穿的,休闲的
entry.def: Informal clothes are casual and suitable for wearing when you are relaxing, but not on formal occasions.

example.ex: Most of the time Jenny needs informal clothes...
example.tran: 大部分时间珍妮需要休闲服装。
吃午饭时可以穿休闲服。

entry.def: You use informal to describe something that is done unofficially or casually without planning.

example.ex: The two leaders will retire to Camp David for informal discussions.
example.tran: 两位领导人将到戴维营进行非正式讨论。

means.word_mean: 2. with the use of colloquial expressions;

sentences.sentence: "this building is colloquially referred to as The Barn"

means.word_mean: 3. in a causal way; at home;

auth_sentence.content: This clade has been informally called the urticalean rosids.

auth_sentence.content: It might be able to resolve your concerns informally.

Sentence.sentence: As you can see, ladies and gentlemen, the guests were seated very informally around this oval table, which would add to the relaxed atmosphere.

sentences.en: The senator addressed the gathering informally.
sentences.cn: 那位参议员非正式地向与会者发表演说。

sentences.en: You will have a chance to circulate and chat informally.
sentences.cn: 你们会有机会四处走动一下，互相聊聊。
